description: Initial release of prompt templates for Circuit Design AI

changes: Initial task prompts: EXTRACT_DESIGN_GOALS, INITIAL_DESIGN, ANALYZE_SIMULATION_RESULTS
Initial task prompts: OPTIMIZE_PARAMETERS, FIX_ERROR, EXECUTE_USER_INSTRUCTION
